concise_definition: v. 返回, 归还, 报告, 产生; n. 返回, 回报, 报告

definitions.explanation_en: To go or come back to a place, person, or condition, especially the original or previous location or state.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指回到某个地方、人或状态，尤其是原来的或先前的位置或状态。
definitions.example_en: She will return to her hometown next month.

definitions.explanation_en: To give something back to its original owner, place, or condition.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指将某物归还给其原主、原处或原状。
definitions.example_en: Please return the book to the library by Friday.
definitions.example_cn: 请在周五前把书还回图书馆。

definitions.explanation_en: To produce or yield a result, profit, or outcome, especially in financial or measurable terms.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指产生某种结果、利润或收益，尤指在财务或可衡量的方面。
definitions.example_en: The investment returned a 15% profit last year.
definitions.example_cn: 这项投资去年带来了15%的利润。

definitions.explanation_en: To give a response or reply, especially in a formal or official context.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指作出回应或答复，尤指在正式或官方语境中。
definitions.example_en: The committee will return its findings by the end of the week.
definitions.example_cn: 委员会将在本周末前提交其调查结果。

definitions.explanation_en: The act of coming or going back to a place, person, or condition.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指回到某个地方、人或状态的行为。
definitions.example_en: His return after five years abroad was celebrated by the whole family.
definitions.example_cn: 他五年海外归来，全家都为此庆祝。

definitions.explanation_en: The profit, gain, or yield obtained from an investment or action.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指从投资或行动中获得的利润、收益或回报。
definitions.example_en: The stock has a high return over the long term.
definitions.example_cn: 这只股票长期回报率很高。

definitions.explanation_en: An official report or result, especially in elections or investigations.
definitions.explanation_cn: 指正式的报告或结果，尤指选举或调查中的结果。
definitions.example_en: The final return of the election showed a narrow victory.
definitions.example_cn: 选举的最终结果显示出微弱的优势。

comparison.analysis: “Come back” 是口语化表达，强调物理上的“回来”，语气更随意，常用于日常对话。而 “return” 更正式，适用范围更广，可指抽象概念的回归（如返回状态、归还物品、获得回报）。
comparison.example_en: He came back from vacation yesterday.

comparison.analysis: “Give back” 强调主动归还或回馈，常用于道德或情感语境（如回馈社会），语气更温情。而 “return” 更中性，可涵盖法律、金融、物理等多领域，如归还物品、返还资金。
comparison.example_en: She gave back the money she found on the street.
comparison.example_cn: 她把在街上捡到的钱还了回去。

comparison.analysis: “Revert” 通常指恢复到之前的状态，尤其在技术或程序语境中（如恢复默认设置），带有“逆向变化”的含义，常用于被动或非自愿的回归。而 “return” 更中性，可主动选择回归，且不局限于状态变化。
comparison.example_en: The system will revert to factory settings after a reset.
comparison.example_cn: 系统重置后将恢复出厂设置。

comparison.analysis: “Yield” 侧重于生产、产出或让步，常用于农业、金融或谈判语境，强调结果的被动性或被迫性（如土地产出作物、一方在谈判中让步）。而 “return” 在表示回报时更强调收益的主动性或可预期性，如投资回报。
comparison.example_en: The farm yields 500 bushels of corn per acre.
comparison.example_cn: 这个农场每英亩可产出500蒲式耳玉米。
